title: Set Up Geotargeting for a Campaign
description: A manager for a local business wants to run ads that only target users within a 10-mile radius of their store.

tasks.description: Find the campaign to be updated.
In the location targeting settings, select 'radius targeting'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent navigates to the correct setting.

tasks.description: Enter the store's address and set the radius to 10 miles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully defines the geographic target area.
